name: RezBS Connect
author: Ben Jamieson

sections.description:
RezBS is the primary tour booking and management platform for The Bahamas. The platform is a cloud-based software as a service booking and management system for tour operators throughout the Bahamas. The platform is the only one that allows tour operators to take credit card payments tied directly to their own e-commerce accounts with all major Bahamian banks.

Details can be found at RezBS.com.

RezBS Connect if completely free to use, and connects your WordPress website to your RezBS account to allow simple insertion of tour and trip booking links through shortcodes.

Buttons can be customised with any label or class, and inserted into any page on your site quickly and simply.

RezBS Connect is compatible with Classic Editor, Gutenberg, and most pagebuilders (tested in Beaver Builder, Elementor, Divi & WP Bakery).

Requirements:

  • An account on the RezBS booking platform.
  • an SSL certificate installed on your site for security.
  • the API key found in your RezBS dashbaord under integration.

Support for RezBS

If you need assistance getting your account, or this plug-in set up, please use the Support tab in your RezBS account.
sections.installation:
1. Install the ResBS Connect plugin
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Enter your RezBS.com API key under the RezBS Connect menu (this can be found under “Integrations” in your account.)
  4. Add your Book Now buttons using the text editor or your preferred page builder.
sections.changelog:
1.7

Release Date: 2024-02-05

  • Rebuild to re-instate compatibility with Gutenberg blocks in WordPress 6.4.x

1.6.2.2

Release Date: 2024-02-01

  • Critical Bug Fix

1.6.2.1

Release Date: 2024-02-01

  • Regression – compatibility only up to 6.4.2. Temporary Release
  • Temporary Downgrade in WP compatibility version

1.6.2

Release Date: 2023-08-10

  • Confirm compatibility with WordPress 6.4 and Classic Editor, Gutenberg, Divi, Elementor and Beaver Builder
  • Update to WP compatibility version

1.6.1

Release Date: 2023-08-10

  • Confirm compatibility with WordPress 6.3 and Classic Editor, Gutenberg, Divi, Elementor and Beaver Builder
  • Update to WP compatibility version

1.5.8

Release Date: 2023-06-24

  • Update to WP compatibility version

1.5.7

Release Date: 2022-06-01

  • Update to WP compatibility version

1.5.6

Release Date: 2022-02-17

  • Update to WP compatibility version

1.5.3

Release Date: 2021-09-30

  • Update to WP compatibility version

1.5.2

Release Date: 2021-05-21

  • Bugfix: Fix JS incorrect paths

1.5

Release Date: 2021-05-18

  • Major Release: RezBS Connect now registers a Gutenberg block to allow the addition of custom booking buttons within the Gutenberg editor

1.4.5

Release Date: 2021-05-15

  • Bug fix for loading of javascript in admin side (Classic Editor)

1.4a

Release Date: 2021-05-01

  • Removed Lity to resolve XHR issuse with 3D Secure Payer Authentication

1.4

Release Date: 2020-05-15

  • Bug fix for displaying button on custom text editors in Beaver Builder and DIVI Page builders

1.2

Release Date: 2016-09-28

  • Switched mobile devices to target=_blank due to issues with scrolling modal overlays.

1.1d

Release Date: 2016-09-27

  • Added credit to Jan Sorgalla for Lity, included under MIT License
  • Mods to Lity CSS to workaround iOS scroll issues

1.1c

Release Date: 2016-09-12

  • Cleaned up code
  • Added default button style
  • Reverted to Lity for overlay method

1.1b

Release Date: 2016-09-07

  • Initial Beta Release

short_description: RezBS Connect connects Wordpress to the RezBS booking platform for online booking integration.
